channel.title: Armadyl Sword (REMAKE)
channel.description:
I decided to remake my armadyl sword because to be honest it was very plain. soooo, without further or due, here's the pictures ha
(this is my first model using all prims!!) :D :D :D :P
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/24b90nl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2lcphk7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/wqtyxi.jpg[/img]
wire, [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/24ede92.jpg[/img]
i put so much faces on the jewel because i wanted the render to not look crappy, ha
[size=24pt]Also!! I NEEEEEEED to know how to make a skull out of a prim!!! if anyone would take the time to show that would be awesome!![/size] i'm working on a new super cool sword but i cant make a skull for the life of me!

item.title: Armadyl Sword (REMAKE)
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

sort of looks like the master sword from TLOZ series.

Read full topic

item.title: Armadyl Sword (REMAKE)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Create a plane, move it to how you like, then delete the faces where you want it to go and then use create face tool. If you want a detailed skull like realistic like, then use a segmented cube like tribb said.

Read full topic

item.title: Armadyl Sword (REMAKE)
item.dc:creator: @Timberpig1 Timberpig.
item.description:
@Timberpig1 wrote:

but how exactly did you get the eyes and the nose in there?

Read full topic

item.title: Armadyl Sword (REMAKE)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Matters what detailed of a skull you want. If you want a skull for like Runescape I used a 6 sided sphere for that and then just scaled and moved it to make it look like a skull. Here’s a picture.

Read full topic

item.title: Armadyl Sword (REMAKE)
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

Tribbinator:

A skull out of primitives, thats more difficult, it takes alot of shaping and re-shaping, My best word of advice, just use a segmented cube and go from there! The hilt area is not messy h1, its quite clean, but it is thin

No I meant like the jewel doesn’t need that many polygon’s it could have alot less, and yeah it is thin XD lol

Edit : Nevermind XD lol never read the part where it said he had so many polygons on the jewel because he didn’t want render to look crap XD lol

So other than the thin hilt its a pretty nice model

Read full topic

item.title: Armadyl Sword (REMAKE)
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

A skull out of primitives, thats more difficult, it takes alot of shaping and re-shaping, My best word of advice, just use a segmented cube and go from there! The hilt area is not messy h1, its quite clean, but it is thin

Read full topic

item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

Messy around the jewel and the hilt looks abit thin but other than that goodjob and I would show you how to make a skull out of prims but never done it before XD lol
